tool_description: An API to setup and manage activity of a Tenis and Padel club: create courts, make bookings, add players and teams, define tournamentes, keep track of results and provide Rankings
name: PadelFirst
title: PadelFirst

api_list.name: Leages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://padelfirst.p.rapidapi.com/leages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "padelfirst.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://padelfirst.p.rapidapi.com/leages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "padelfirst.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
